document.query: CREATE TABLE `purchase_product` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `purchase_request_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `vendor_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `product_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `quantity` int(11) NOT NULL, `cost` float NOT NULL, `total_cost` float(20,2) NOT NULL, `created_at` datetime NOT NULL, `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
